page.title: 13 POPULATION
page.content: Sark's average population is 560 but there are people coming and going in the summer, either for work or for a holiday. There are 24 families with children at the Sark School and there are 34 pupils, from 5 to 15 years of age. There are approximately 85 children under the age of 16 years on the Island but the last boy and girl born in Sark were in 1968. Now a "Mother To Be" has to go to Guernsey. The cost of a night's stay in Guernsey Hospital is Â£100.00 There are 193 people over 60 years old on the island,58% of which are retired English people. The population in the summer is trebled because people come over from England to drive carriages for the tourists who also come and stay.
